name: Assault//Battery
description:
In Assault//Battery, you're the pilot of an advanced tactical mecha. Except you're drunk. Or maybe the mech is drunk, we can't tell. And runs on a short battery.

We've shaved any complexities of piloting down to simple click-and-drag controls, since you're drunk. Or the mech. Either way, click and drag, and lay waste to the city of the evil Zendardians, whose tanks have a proclivity to duck and roll. Truly evil.

Controls are just mouse, and R to restart.

Hope you enjoy this brief yet action-packed romp!

Assault//Battery was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 39, the theme was Running Out of Power. Please rate the game on the LDjam site if you're also a jammer! :D https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/assaultbattery
